docs: LazorKit: Smart Wallet with WebAuthn Passkey Authentication

accounts.name: chunk
docs: Expired chunk to close and refund rent

accounts.name: payer
docs: The account that pays for the wallet creation and initial SOL transfer

accounts.name: policy_program_registry
docs: Policy program registry that validates the default policy program

accounts.name: smart_wallet
docs: The smart wallet address PDA being created with the provided wallet ID

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program for account creation and SOL transfers

accounts.name: lazorkit_vault
docs: LazorKit vault (empty PDA that holds SOL) - random vault selected by client

accounts.name: chunk
docs: Transaction session to execute. Closed to refund rent.

accounts.name: fee_payer
docs: Fee payer for the transaction (stored in authorization)

accounts.name: ephemeral_signer
docs: Ephemeral key that can sign transactions (must be signer)

accounts.name: lazorkit_vault
docs: LazorKit vault (empty PDA that holds SOL) - random vault selected by client

accounts.name: permission
docs: Ephemeral authorization to execute. Closed on success to refund rent.

accounts.name: permission
docs: New ephemeral authorization account (rent payer: payer)

accounts.name: signer
docs: The signer of the transaction, who will be the initial authority.

accounts.name: config
docs: The program's configuration account.

accounts.name: policy_program_registry
docs: The registry of policy programs that can be used with smart wallets.

accounts.name: default_policy_program
docs: The default policy program to be used for new smart wallets.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The current authority of the program.

accounts.name: config
docs: The program's configuration account.

accounts.name: vault
docs: Individual vault PDA (empty account that holds SOL)

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program

accounts.name: authority
docs: The current authority of the program.

accounts.name: config
docs: The program's configuration account.

errors.name: PasskeyMismatch
errors.msg: Passkey public key mismatch with stored authenticator

errors.name: SmartWalletConfigMismatch
errors.msg: Smart wallet address mismatch with authenticator

errors.name: Secp256r1InvalidLength
errors.msg: Secp256r1 instruction has invalid data length

errors.name: InvalidSignature
errors.msg: Invalid signature provided for passkey verification

errors.name: ClientDataInvalidUtf8
errors.msg: Client data JSON is not valid UTF-8

errors.name: ChallengeMissing
errors.msg: Challenge field missing from client data JSON

errors.name: TimestampTooOld
errors.msg: Message timestamp is too far in the past

errors.name: TimestampTooNew
errors.msg: Message timestamp is too far in the future

errors.name: HashMismatch
errors.msg: Message hash mismatch: expected different value

errors.name: PolicyProgramNotRegistered
errors.msg: Policy program not found in registry

errors.name: WhitelistFull
errors.msg: The policy program registry is full.

errors.name: PolicyProgramsIdentical
errors.msg: Old and new policy programs are identical

errors.name: NoDefaultPolicyProgram
errors.msg: Neither old nor new policy program is the default

errors.name: CpiDataMissing
errors.msg: CPI data is required but not provided

errors.name: InsufficientPolicyAccounts
errors.msg: Insufficient remaining accounts for policy instruction

errors.name: InsufficientCpiAccounts
errors.msg: Insufficient remaining accounts for CPI instruction

errors.name: AccountSliceOutOfBounds
errors.msg: Account slice index out of bounds

errors.name: TransferAmountOverflow
errors.msg: Transfer amount would cause arithmetic overflow

errors.name: InvalidBumpSeed
errors.msg: Invalid bump seed for PDA derivation

errors.name: CredentialIdTooLarge
errors.msg: Credential ID exceeds maximum allowed size

errors.name: PolicyDataTooLarge
errors.msg: Policy data exceeds maximum allowed size

errors.name: CpiDataTooLarge
errors.msg: CPI data exceeds maximum allowed size

types.name: CallPolicyArgs
docs: Arguments for calling policy program instructions
Contains WebAuthn authentication data and policy program parameters
required for executing policy program instructions like adding/removing devices.

fields.name: passkey_public_key
docs: Public key of the WebAuthn passkey for authentication

fields.name: signature
docs: WebAuthn signature for transaction authorization

fields.name: client_data_json_raw
docs: Raw client data JSON from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: authenticator_data_raw
docs: Raw authenticator data from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: verify_instruction_index
docs: Index of the Secp256r1 verification instruction

fields.name: policy_data
docs: Policy program instruction data

fields.name: new_wallet_device
docs: Optional new wallet device to add during policy call

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Random vault index (0-31) calculated off-chain for fee distribution

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp for message verification

fields.name: smart_wallet_is_signer
docs: Whether the smart wallet is the signer

types.name: ChangePolicyArgs
docs: Arguments for changing a smart wallet's policy program
Contains WebAuthn authentication data and policy program parameters
required for securely changing the policy program governing a wallet.

fields.name: passkey_public_key
docs: Public key of the WebAuthn passkey for authentication

fields.name: signature
docs: WebAuthn signature for transaction authorization

fields.name: client_data_json_raw
docs: Raw client data JSON from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: authenticator_data_raw
docs: Raw authenticator data from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: verify_instruction_index
docs: Index of the Secp256r1 verification instruction

fields.name: split_index
docs: Index for splitting remaining accounts between policy and CPI

fields.name: destroy_policy_data
docs: Data for destroying the old policy program

fields.name: init_policy_data
docs: Data for initializing the new policy program

fields.name: new_wallet_device
docs: Optional new wallet device to add during policy change

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Random vault index (0-31) calculated off-chain for fee distribution

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp for message verification

types.name: Chunk
docs: Transaction chunk for deferred execution
Created after full passkey and policy verification. Contains all bindings
necessary to execute the transaction later without re-verification.
Used for large transactions that need to be split into manageable chunks.

fields.name: owner_wallet_address
docs: Smart wallet address that authorized this chunk session

fields.name: cpi_hash
docs: Combined SHA256 hash of all cpi transaction instruction data

fields.name: authorized_nonce
docs: The nonce that was authorized at chunk creation (bound into data hash)

fields.name: authorized_timestamp
docs: Timestamp from the original message hash for expiration validation

fields.name: rent_refund_address
docs: Address to receive rent refund when closing the chunk session

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Vault index for fee collection during chunk execution

types.name: Config
docs: LazorKit program configuration and settings
Stores global program configuration including fee structures, default policy
program, and operational settings. Only the program authority can modify
these settings through the update_config instruction.
Memory layout optimized for better cache performance:
- Group related fields together
- Align fields to natural boundaries

fields.name: is_paused
docs: Whether the program is currently paused (1 byte)

fields.name: create_smart_wallet_fee
docs: Fee charged for creating a new smart wallet (in lamports) (8 bytes)

fields.name: fee_payer_fee
docs: Fee charged to the fee payer for transactions (in lamports) (8 bytes)

fields.name: referral_fee
docs: Fee paid to referral addresses (in lamports) (8 bytes)

fields.name: lazorkit_fee
docs: Fee retained by LazorKit protocol (in lamports) (8 bytes)

fields.name: authority
docs: Program authority that can modify configuration settings (32 bytes)

fields.name: default_policy_program_id
docs: Default policy program ID for new smart wallets (32 bytes)

types.name: CreateChunkArgs
docs: Arguments for creating a chunk buffer for large transactions
Contains WebAuthn authentication data and parameters required for
creating chunk buffers when transactions exceed size limits.

fields.name: passkey_public_key
docs: Public key of the WebAuthn passkey for authentication

fields.name: signature
docs: WebAuthn signature for transaction authorization

fields.name: client_data_json_raw
docs: Raw client data JSON from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: authenticator_data_raw
docs: Raw authenticator data from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: verify_instruction_index
docs: Index of the Secp256r1 verification instruction

fields.name: policy_data
docs: Policy program instruction data

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Random vault index (0-31) calculated off-chain for fee distribution

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp for message verification (must be <= on-chain time + 30s)

fields.name: cpi_hash
docs: Hash of CPI data and accounts (32 bytes)

types.name: CreateSmartWalletArgs
docs: Arguments for creating a new smart wallet
Contains all necessary parameters for initializing a new smart wallet
with WebAuthn passkey authentication and policy program configuration.

fields.name: passkey_public_key
docs: Public key of the WebAuthn passkey for authentication

fields.name: credential_id
docs: Unique credential ID from WebAuthn registration

fields.name: policy_data
docs: Policy program initialization data

fields.name: wallet_id
docs: Random wallet ID provided by client for uniqueness

fields.name: amount
docs: Initial SOL amount to transfer to the wallet

fields.name: referral_address
docs: Optional referral address for fee sharing

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Random vault index (0-31) calculated off-chain for fee distribution

types.name: ExecuteArgs
docs: Arguments for executing a transaction through the smart wallet
Contains WebAuthn authentication data and transaction parameters
required for secure transaction execution with policy validation.

fields.name: passkey_public_key
docs: Public key of the WebAuthn passkey for authentication

fields.name: signature
docs: WebAuthn signature for transaction authorization

fields.name: client_data_json_raw
docs: Raw client data JSON from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: authenticator_data_raw
docs: Raw authenticator data from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: verify_instruction_index
docs: Index of the Secp256r1 verification instruction

fields.name: split_index
docs: Index for splitting remaining accounts between policy and CPI

fields.name: policy_data
docs: Policy program instruction data

fields.name: cpi_data
docs: Cross-program invocation instruction data

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Random vault index (0-31) calculated off-chain for fee distribution

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp for message verification

types.name: GrantPermissionArgs
docs: Arguments for granting ephemeral permission to a keypair
Contains WebAuthn authentication data and parameters required for
granting time-limited permission to an ephemeral keypair for
multiple operations without repeated passkey authentication.

fields.name: passkey_public_key
docs: Public key of the WebAuthn passkey for authentication

fields.name: signature
docs: WebAuthn signature for transaction authorization

fields.name: client_data_json_raw
docs: Raw client data JSON from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: authenticator_data_raw
docs: Raw authenticator data from WebAuthn authentication

fields.name: verify_instruction_index
docs: Index of the Secp256r1 verification instruction

fields.name: ephemeral_public_key
docs: Ephemeral public key that will receive permission

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Unix timestamp when the permission expires

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Random vault index (0-31) calculated off-chain for fee distribution

fields.name: instruction_data_list
docs: All instruction data to be authorized for execution

fields.name: split_index
docs: Split indices for accounts (n-1 for n instructions)

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp for message verification

types.name: NewWalletDeviceArgs
docs: Arguments for adding a new wallet device (passkey)
Contains the necessary data for adding a new WebAuthn passkey
to an existing smart wallet for enhanced security and convenience.

fields.name: passkey_public_key
docs: Public key of the new WebAuthn passkey

fields.name: credential_id
docs: Unique credential ID from WebAuthn registration (max 256 bytes)

types.name: Permission
docs: Ephemeral authorization for temporary program access
Created after passkey authentication to allow execution with an ephemeral key
for a limited time. Enables multiple operations without repeated passkey
authentication, ideal for games and applications requiring frequent interactions.

fields.name: owner_wallet_address
docs: Smart wallet address that authorized this permission session

fields.name: ephemeral_public_key
docs: Ephemeral public key that can sign transactions during this session

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Unix timestamp when this permission session expires

fields.name: fee_payer_address
docs: Fee payer address for transactions in this session

fields.name: rent_refund_address
docs: Address to receive rent refund when closing the session

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Vault index for fee collection during this session

fields.name: instruction_data_hash
docs: Combined hash of all instruction data that can be executed

fields.name: accounts_metadata_hash
docs: Combined hash of all accounts that will be used in this session

types.name: PolicyProgramRegistry
docs: Registry of approved policy programs for smart wallet operations
Maintains a whitelist of policy programs that can be used to govern
smart wallet transaction validation and security rules.

fields.name: registered_programs
docs: List of registered policy program addresses (max 10)

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation and verification

types.name: SmartWalletConfig
docs: Core data account for a LazorKit smart wallet
Stores the essential state information for a smart wallet including its
unique identifier, policy program configuration, and authentication nonce
for replay attack prevention.
Memory layout optimized for better cache performance:
- Group related fields together
- Align fields to natural boundaries

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation and verification (1 byte)

fields.name: wallet_id
docs: Unique identifier for this smart wallet instance (8 bytes)

fields.name: last_nonce
docs: Last nonce used for message verification to prevent replay attacks (8 bytes)

fields.name: referral_address
docs: Referral address that receives referral fees from this wallet (32 bytes)

fields.name: policy_program_id
docs: Policy program that governs this wallet's transaction validation rules (32 bytes)

types.name: UpdateType
docs: Types of configuration parameters that can be updated
Defines all the configuration parameters that can be modified through
the update_config instruction by the program authority.

types.name: WalletDevice
docs: Account that stores a wallet device (passkey) for smart wallet authentication
Each wallet device represents a WebAuthn passkey that can be used to authenticate
transactions for a specific smart wallet. Multiple devices can be associated with
a single smart wallet for enhanced security and convenience.
Memory layout optimized for better cache performance:
- Group related fields together
- Align fields to natural boundaries

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation and verification (1 byte)

fields.name: passkey_public_key
docs: Public key of the WebAuthn passkey for transaction authorization (33 bytes)

fields.name: smart_wallet_address
docs: Smart wallet address this device is associated with (32 bytes)

fields.name: credential_id
docs: Unique credential ID from WebAuthn registration (variable length, max 256 bytes)
